title: Over 45,000 SQ Ft of FANTASTIC AMENITIES!
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post   Call Apartment Guys and ask for reference #2202625. This incredible Lakeshore East/South Streeterville Luxury Hi-Rise building has absolutely everything you would want or need! It has 9 ft ceilings. floor to ceiling windows with amazing lake or city views, quartz countertops, stainless appliances, plank floors and washer and dryer in the unit! The building amenities include a 25-yard indoor lap pool as well as an outdoor pool, a dog run, a fitness center with lakefront views, yoga studio, a game room with billiards and shuffleboard, a golf and sports simulator for year-round play, and a kids club indoor play space. During nice weather enjoy the shared outdoor common area green space!  Prices are subject to change. ***Photos may be of a similar unit.****For faster response best to call or text 773-549-3474 with reference #2202625
